StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetIMOAc.vi.esList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ac.vity varchar(2), @type varchar(5), @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er = null, @OrgID int = null, @DateFrom date.me = null, @DateTo date.me = null, @IsApproved bit = 0
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF (@ac.vity = 'TC') BEGIN IF (@type = 'M') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect ON pc.ProspectId = USMC.Prospect.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON USMC.Prospect.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'NA', 'NH', 'NHCB', 'NHLM') AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'C') BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector ,pc.Comment as Note ,pct.ProspectCommentType + ' - ' + pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on as Comment ,dp.ProspectDisposi.onType as disposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect p ON pc.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON p.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on dp ON p.ProspectDisposi.onId = dp.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END
ELSE IF (@type = 'A') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='TC') AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11)))
END
ELSE IF (@type = 'I') BEGIN SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='TC' ) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END END
ELSE IF (@ac.vity = 'OT') BEGIN IF (@type = 'M') BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector ,pc.Comment as Note ,pct.ProspectCommentType + ' - ' + pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on as Comment ,dp.ProspectDisposi.onType as disposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect p ON pc.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON p.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on dp ON p.ProspectDisposi.onId = dp.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'OT' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('OT-S', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'I') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='OT' ) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END END
ELSE IF (@ac.vity = 'AC') BEGIN IF (@type = 'M') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector ,pc.Comment as Note ,pct.ProspectCommentType + ' - ' + pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on as Comment ,dp.ProspectDisposi.onType as disposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect p ON pc.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON p.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on dp ON p.ProspectDisposi.onId = dp.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'A') BEGIN SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='AC') AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END ELSE IF (@type = 'I') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='AC' ) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END
END
ELSE IF (@ac.vity = 'HV') BEGIN IF (@type = 'M') BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect ON pc.ProspectId = USMC.Prospect.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON USMC.Prospect.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'HV' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'HV-NA', 'HV-NH') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'C') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector ,pc.Comment as Note ,pct.ProspectCommentType + ' - ' + pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on as Comment ,dp.ProspectDisposi.onType as disposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect p ON pc.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON p.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on dp ON p.ProspectDisposi.onId = dp.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'HV' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'A') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='HV') AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END ELSE IF (@type = 'I') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='HV' ) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END END ELSE IF (@ac.vity = 'DC') BEGIN IF (@type = 'M') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect ON pc.ProspectId = USMC.Prospect.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON USMC.Prospect.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'DC-U', 'DC-M', 'DC-R') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'C') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT pc.prospectCommentId AS ID, pac.Ac.vity AS CardType, USMC.Person.LastName + ', ' + USMC.Person.FirstName + ' ' + IsNull(USMC.Person.MiddleName,'') AS Name, pc.ProspectDate as LastUpdateDate, pac.Ac.vity, pct.ProspectCommentType, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on, 0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], pc.prospectId as primaryguid, pc.prospectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector ,pc.Comment as Note ,pct.ProspectCommentType + ' - ' + pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on as Comment ,dp.ProspectDisposi.onType as disposi.on FROM USMC.ProspectComment AS pc INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment AS pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType AS pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.Prospect p ON pc.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN USMC.Person ON p.PersonId = USMC.Person.PersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on dp ON p.ProspectDisposi.onId = dp.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND (LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(pc.ProspectDate,11))) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) END ELSE IF (@type = 'A') BEGIN SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='DC') AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END ELSE IF (@type = 'I') BEGIN
SELECT dis.nct e.ID, s.SubjectName AS Name, UPPER(@ac.vity) as CardType, e.StartDate as LastUpdateDate,0 as [year], UPPER(@ac.vity) as [type], s.SubjectId as primaryguid, s.SubjectId as addi.onalguid, '0' as sector FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='DC' ) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@dateFrom, LEFT(StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@dateTo, LEFT(StartDate,11))) END END
END
